WorkItem.Description:
Starting 2012/01/01, CMS (The goverment agency responsible for Medicaid and Medicare) will mandate the use of the 5010 version of the 834. 
Â 
I would like to request implementation of support for this transaction set.
WorkItem.Summary: Request for transaction set: 5010 version of 834

Comments.Message:
I tested this enhancement (using parser version 12316) with a sample file from DHCS (http://www.dhcs.ca.gov/formsandpubs/laws/hipaa/Documents/2.02%20834%205010%20Documents/2.02%20DHCS834-DA20110712-Medical-123-HCP-001.txt) Parsing was successful.

The prior version of the parser that I was using (10775) would produce an error: OopFactory.X12.Parsing.Model.TransactionValidationException : Segment 'QTY*TO*6' in position 4 within transaction '0001' cannot be identified within the supplied specification for transaction set 834.

Thank you for implementing!
